author: Skylark95
name: HF
install_msg: Require HF api key. see huggingface site to get an API.
short: Send messages to HuggingFace AI, fork of ChatGPT cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. However, this cog does pass user data to an external API for the purposes of simulated conversation responses. (huggingface)
